Title: keep getting error when installing W11
Description:
Today i got help from microsoft.support, they referred/advised me to Insider Program.

Problem is that everytime Windows 10 tries to update/install Windows 11: at the end it stops en deïnstalls.

(it says: 0xC1900101 - 0x4000D. "Installatie is mislukt in fase SECOND\_BOOT, met een fout tijdens de MIGRATE\_DATA-bewerking" All my hardware is ok, drivers ok, antivirus stopped when installing, etc. But i keep getting this problem. Possibly due to Insider program, they told me. How can i fix it?

I have logs from the installproces.
Author: kingofthebongo
